meanings.definition: The act of making small changes to improve the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: Her titivation of the room involved rearranging the furniture for a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: The titivation of the garden with colorful flowers made it more beautiful.
meanings.sent3: After some titivation, the old painting looked like new again.
meanings.sent4: Her titivation of the plain dress turned it into a stunning outfit.
meanings.sent5: The titivation of the cake with icing and decorations made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: The process of adding decorative touches to enhance the attractiveness of something.
meanings.sent1: The titivation of the gift box with ribbons and bows made it look festive.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the titivation of her workspace with colorful posters.
meanings.sent3: The titivation of the cupcakes with sprinkles added a fun touch to the party.
meanings.sent4: The titivation of the room with fairy lights created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: His titivation of the car with shiny rims and decals made it stand out.
